name: The Forgotten (seagull743)
description:
As the player you are stuck in an abandoned house, where there was recently a murder by a surposed paranormal event. The player is tasked with finding notes that will help him gain the password that opens a safe containing the key to the front door. While the player is roaming the house, paranormal events will happen. You are not alone, a monster is hunting you!

The game was created by a group of people.
